name: Hoshou Marine Boat Game
description:
Marine will move opposite of where you click anywhere on the screen, game will not end if you are collided with the boulders, game will end if marine is out of the screen.

I'm currently trying to go back to game dev, feel free to DM me if you want to make games with me or you want me on your team.

Also feel free to comment any suggestion or bugs you encountered in the game.
